comment.language: On Watos days (Wednesday through Saturday), the people say the following.
Pada Hari-hari Watos (Rabu sampai Sabtu), umat mengucapkan bagian berikut ini.
On Adam days (Sunday through Tuesday), the people say the following.
Pada Hari-hari Adam (Minggu sampai Selasa), tumat mengucapkan bagian berikut ini.
